item.title: Police
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

You quoted wrong, but I’ll reply to you regardless.

If there was a "drug deal" they would send more then 1 cop.

Sure, I didn’t say otherwise. I simply said 9 cops can’t get out of 4 cars (you know because police cars have 2 seats in the front and then room for offenders in the back)
Thus at most 8 cops would have gotten out.

Talk to me when you've had a gun pointed at you.
Not even relevant to my point? You mustn't be too clever.
They pull some of his interrior of his car out.. They did this with a screwdriver douchebag
Oh they searched the interior of a car with a screwdriver? Well fuck me that must have been hard, what did they do?.. stab holes in the upholstery? (To the degree of $1000 in damages too apparently)

Read full topic

item.title: Police
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

[quote=“Pr0ject pvp, post:7, topic:433044”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=535764.msg3917067#msg3917067 date=1329312234]
Well, this doesn’t sound made up at all.

EDIT: I suppose I should justify myself:

9 cops got out of 4 cars? OK.
Police aiming for the head? No sir.
Searching without giving a reason first? No.
Stripping a car apart on the road side with no tools? Lol.

What actually happened? See the above post.

If there was a “drug deal” they would send more then 1 cop.
Talk to me when you’ve had a gun pointed at you.
They pull some of his interrior of his car out… They did this with a screwdriver douchebag
[/quote][/quote]

So, let me fully understand this situation that we got ourself into here Tammy.

9 polizi’ got out of 4 cars, pointed glocks up in your grill and then began to strip away your friends car interior with screwdrivers, without no reason?

yeah, sounds legit.

Read full topic
